ComicInfo.Summary:
Savage Dragon'ventures to New Port City, home of the notorious Bomb Queen! All hell breaks lose in this explosive issue that unites these titular Image stars. Savage Dragon's world tour begins here as the Dragon explores the Image Universe in search of his missing wife.
Savage Dragon battles a neon pink woman who claims to be the Bomb Queen and he talks her down into submission only for the real bomb queen to jump in and start a ruckus. Savage takes out the fake Bomb Queen. Of course Bomb Queen could never tolerate a hero in her town and she attacks, blowing out his left elbow. He flattens her with a single punch and brokers a deal, he will find the mystic in her city and leave. She grudgingly agrees.
ComicInfo.Title: Bombed
